Reviews.Title: “Lovely staff & hotel”
Reviews.Author: Daithi28
Reviews.Content: last week last minute decision barcelona trip little direct transportation big 1 minute walk clot red line metro nights cheap taxi drive take little bit old minibar split flat tv price air conditioning room interiors enough recommend hotel easy

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: ell33
Reviews.Content: booked hotel one price 3 days later price dropped 25 euros per night told responded short email saying price agreed charged know fact nothing paid end hotel stay talked 5 different people none helpful said saturday reservations team would present help questions surely something could done saturday asked speak reservations rude woman front desk looked said saturday dont work needless say angry even asked could throw breakfast price change simply said somewhat request asked bus schedule airport told buses didnt run sundays true b told wait line 30 min line check even though explained catch bus going miss plane ended happening thanks fact one person working front desk sunday check time c idea bus schedule sick tired lack service one man nice one works night hotel way overpriced far everything metro close waste much time metro end money imagine euros way although 10 ride passes day passes adds fast within walking distance anything despite say rooms clean good thing hotel im definitely staying somewhere else maybe booking last minute low season

Reviews.Title: “Lovely staff & room, a little noisy but great value for money!!”
Reviews.Author: Belle260310
Reviews.Content: stay pleasant hotel clean quiet good service location handy metro best part breakfast dinner buffet lots choice delicious food good value

Reviews.Title: “Good location but not 4 Star”
Reviews.Author: BlackPanda_12
Reviews.Content: staff breakfast location good get metro clot las ramblas 5 minutes tv needs free wireless access wonderful us stunning stay go barcelona would stay sure

Reviews.Title: “Good price for central location”
Reviews.Author: StockholmTom
Reviews.Content: three us stayed 3 nights hotel overall nice experience spacious room great breakfast nice friendly stuff fast internet available inside lobby pay credit card required quiet night location near sagrada familia far away center barcelona still good deal

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: TravelByTips
Reviews.Content: hotel 4 minutes walk clot metro takes 20 mins hotel metro get main attractions apart sagrada familia walked 15 mins room large clean bathroom 6th floor area seemed bit run toilet flush properly hotel sorted quickly staff efficient overly friendly eg sure one female receptionists ability smile however couple staff friendly helpful breakfast quite nice selection pastries cereals coffee hot options bacon hotel clean noise issues although perhaps due time year appears ever one person reception bit problem hotel size clot metro red line 1 line 2 allows easy access things see arriving leave station red line exit hotel also provides dinner

Reviews.Title: “Ok experience with a few problems”
Reviews.Author: squigs55
Reviews.Content: hotel 3 star rating 1 star first location bad far away city attractions sagrada familia near elevators cannot get room take right one hallways dark stairs get across room without given narrow design room bathroom huge toilet paper located opposite wall toilet problem one take paper front desk personal take leave attitude restaurant price safe never recommend place anybody

Reviews.Title: “Dont ask the reception to order you a taxi”
Reviews.Author: GEO4181
Reviews.Content: spent hotel 3 nights hotel nice hotel clean quiet rooms location breakfast included costs 12 euros nearby cheap coffe croissant eur 140 eur 200 location walking distance sagrada familia 10 minutes one hour walking de gracia 2 metro lines red one lead 10 minutes city centre metro 23 minutes far hotel airport take local train directly de gracia change metro total cost eur suggest take 10 ticket eur 10 metro bus tickets single ticket costs eur 130 use train

Reviews.Title: “Great choice”
Reviews.Author: magicmat
Reviews.Content: quite surprise hotel nice breakfast excellent room quiet clean almost noise outside surprise everything read hotel run problems room central air conditioner work 34 c outside hotel full couldnt change rooms front desk forgot book ride back airport requested night made us navigate metro bus system 530 seem interested helping us made sound like fault booking night

Reviews.Title: “Hotel doesn't offer refunds ... even during strike with no way to get there”
Reviews.Author: cruiserfromnj
Reviews.Content: stayed aragon 3 nights pleasantly surprised experience hotel lovely stay read numerous reviews bit reluctant worked customer service impeccable front desk staff helpful possible others always best ability checked tickets looked dinner reservations location reviews noted hotel far away looking planning go found hotel accessible 2 minute walk clot metro station well connected without needing multiple transfers said given nice weather took nice walks la sagrada familia even way las ramblas find much trouble great location able see less touristy spots eat authentic meals wed stayed directly city center stayed 4 full days use metro cards despite fact everyone breakfast eat instead opted amazing 65 croissants bakery 1 block past hotel away metro amazing fresh much better 12 euro option hotel also local convenient store bottle water walking town better buy la sagrada familiar bottle 250 euros booking booked rate lower website expedia emailed reservation staff aragon emailed back promptly worked ensure room 2 beds pushed together boyfriend sleep across room helpful reservations surprised sending barcelona information tours etc apartment arrived left could start plan trip hope helps would definitely return hotel clean modern refreshing

Reviews.Title: “Needs to be re-rated, definitely not a 4 star!”
Reviews.Author: Patriciaychou
Reviews.Content: stayed one night hotel clean modern nice atmosphere shower room big enough party although didnt try breakfast looked nice easy walk get metro rest city

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel - don't be taken by these reviews!!”
Reviews.Author: KristinDenver
Reviews.Content: transferred adjacent hotel probably received better value hotel bedroom smelt little fairly small clean comfortable modern bathroom bath shower plenty choice breakfast buffet omelettes available cooked order well usual selection food receive surly reception arrived saturday breakfast served later weekends hotel short walk clot metro station saved lot time money travel tickets access bus metro third visit barcelona gets better time much see beautiful colours time included tour fantastic de catalunya also well visiting normal gaudi hotel aragon fine purpose complaint holiday fly home end

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, friendly staff, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Nestorex
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights 2005 didnt like hotel renovation put part hotel sure room nothing special worst ive small old heater grabbed wall dust bathroom much better clean friends change room 1st one really strange smell dirty staff really bad unhelpful breakfast always looking us going steal food something didnt offer help luggage gave us rooms located somewhere strange asked help find rooms unpleasant breakfast really good wide choice new good conditions hotel far away heart barcelona night zone quite scary shops closed metal doors pleasant walk night nearest metro station clot 510 minutes walking metro station dirty one night think hotel renovated return barcelona would choose catalonia aragon

Reviews.Title: “Good Location & Friendly Staff at Millenni”
Reviews.Author: OhioEmilyOhio
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel almost week honeymoon vacation three stars hotel full renovation recently located quiet area walking distance famous sagrada familia metro station later used go easily everywhere details please see

Reviews.Title: “What a Fab Hotel!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Slinks
Reviews.Content: booked hotel fly hotel bit far heart city although clot metro station 5 mins walk away metro line takes heart barcelona room average size beds twin beds pushed together bathroom bit dated served purpose well room walls fairly thin hear people walking wood floor outside room fairly busy first thing morning lift everytime opens buffet breakfast good lots choice whole staff friendly helpful enough go would stay somewhere closer centre

Reviews.Title: “Much better than expected”
Reviews.Author: photojean
Reviews.Content: stayed girlfriend recently thought hotel great paid per night included large buffet breakfast every day impressive everything think hot bacon sausages particular cold croissants many pastries etc coffees etc easily best choice breakfast ive seen yet much better 4 5 star hotels ive offer bedroom alright nice decor decent size bathroom good especially large shower wet room powerful shower stayed 4th floor use lift problems lift location also quite good couple minutes walk clot metro station takes places sagrada familia camp placa catalunya within minutes would say area alright fairly safe always aware around like major european city use common sense youll fine metro city get beach fairly easily also hotel get fairly noisy times mainly floor instance people coming night dont let put staying every hotel ive ever stayed walls quite thin also think common hardly stayed hotel really wasnt problem us dont let put positives easily negatives would highly recommend place especially couples friends families

Reviews.Title: “This is rather a two star hotel !”
Reviews.Author: FreqSurfer
Reviews.Content: room fine well location hotel far city centre however 2 big problems disappointing noise outside constant elevator door throughout night whenever door opened overall didnt get much sleep im disappointed hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, ice staff!”
Reviews.Author: rp874533
Reviews.Content: passed three nights catalonia aragon wife june sent email hotel asking prices receive day call directly hotel receive price stay soon arrive hotel informed value email still expecting answer lower one gave phone price € night check price double fact written correct price would pay double hotel nothing special early morning awake beaten doors levels people walking many teenagers night lot noise elevators function correctly doorman door know give information breakfast stay hotel properly well located going nearby center exit asked price taxi airport informed less 40 € called taxi opted go taxi passed street led 20 € persons staff unpleasant lot finally hotel going come back

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel for weekend break”
Reviews.Author: DPearson
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights found thanks trip tips find deal excellent nights € rooms really big clean big bathroom best thing hotel really quite noise nice long location quite good metro close took breakfast really worth 12 € recommend

Reviews.Title: “Worth a visit but....”
Reviews.Author: Probus
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely would definately go back return visit situated residential part barcelona easy access metro station room clean decent size breakfasts really nice airline book room us requested receptionist called airline letting us check sorted barcelona great never definately going back distant future transport system extremely cheap reliable would recommend getting train centre barcelona airport 2 people worth buy ticket station airport thats cost get hotel dont get charged changing metro looking nice relaxing break hotel city

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: jcotraveller
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights hotel apart rooms quite small clean modern staff hotel nice friendly extremely location nice shops bars away la rambla 5 stops metro centre town took minutes metro 2 mins def stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice location but...”
Reviews.Author: Kowkow_Shanghai
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel three business type hotel seems used tourist open friendly overall comfort ok location good clot metros station less five minutes walking paid € 55 breakfast cheap comfort location

Reviews.Title: “Good base for exploring”
Reviews.Author: itcheefeet
Reviews.Content: boyfriend returned short stay hotel found clean really enjoyed time breakfast excellent ate hotel one night meal lovely menu bit limited menu stayed night stay stayed room floor quiet thankfully air conditioning lift bar remains open 12 quiet also 2 computer saw available use machine get 10 minutes internet time handy order check flight times etc staff speak much english good organising taxis take us wanted go good walk city centre walk quite distance heat much easier taxi wasnt alot immediate area short walk sagrada overall stay enjoyable would definately recommend people short break

Reviews.Title: “good value - pity about air con and elevator noise”
Reviews.Author: spanishjohnny99
Reviews.Content: hotel good location easy access metro stop two metro lines touring room small adequate mattress hard rock dont mind mattress wont complaints hotel modern clean nice breakfast buffet better come prepared staff little help whether need restaurant recommendation directions train station simply wake call staff cant bothered prepaid stay desk clerk still owed room thankfully brought email info sure proof hotel doesnt offer extras price seemed looking clean place stay plan touring inside hotel less friendly staff hotel work

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was OK, but not great”
Reviews.Author: Pengaman
Reviews.Content: stayed three nights month breakfast good good room clean desk staff cordial notice dont greet come go desk thought rude trained hotel also thought would helpful hotel maps available neighborhood instead saying go hotel turn right walk 7 blocks get la sagrada im sure id stay hotel included package

Reviews.Title: “this is a winner”
Reviews.Author: jinxjordan
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 50th birthday trip found convenient metro found friendly local bars nearby one could easily get snack well something required walked hotel sagrada familia quite easily first night friday got metro within 10mins placa catalunya bus fantastic tours around whole city friday returned metro take ambiance las bother nearby metro station took us back area 3 stops room spacious enough well fitted bathroom plenty meal restaurant saturday evening disappointing meals places barcelona service poor food adequate bar service totally open know much hard get someone serve us late nice nightcap back ones hotel seems allowed hotel catalonia aragon would recommend drinking eating elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, great service, nice room, strange shower”
Reviews.Author: aplutzer
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 found couple things could improved hotel service unhelpful lot english speaking tourists staying people working behind poor english rooms small smoke well area heading back hotel 1am get taxi home
